text: Atashasta Justus Nditiye (17 October 1969 â€“ 12 February 2021) was a Tanzanian politician. He is a member of the Chama Cha Mapinduzi (CCM). At the time of his death he was the Deputy Minister for Works, Transport and Communication Responsible for Communication. He was a member of the National Assembly from 2015 until his death.Magufuli swears in new ministers, deputies Retrieved on 15 February 2018 Nditiye was killed in a car crash on 12 February 2021 in Dodoma, Tanzania at the age of 51. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Tanzanian politicians Category:Road accident deaths
title: Atashasta Justus Nditiye
